metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5977 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The zzip_mem_entry_extra_block function in memdisk.c in zziplib 0.13.62 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (invalid memory read and crash) via a crafted ZIP file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5977` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-2ubuntu0.1
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> can't reproduce, fixed by earlier CVE fixes

criterions.comment: zziplib package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-2ubuntu0.1').
